title: Yummy Barbecued Chicken
ingredients: ['4 chicken breasts (or thighs)', 'salt and pepper to season', '3 tablespoons oil', '3 tablespoons Worcestershire sauce', '3 tablespoons tomato puree', '1 spring onion, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons chicken stock', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1 1/2 teaspoons brown sugar']
